query: MATCH p = (a:Actor)-[*1..4]-(d:Director) WHERE a.name in ['Claude Jade', 'Woody Allen', 'Samuel L. Jackson', 'Clint Eastwood', 'Armin Mueller-Stahl', 'Jackie Chan', 'Robert De Niro', 'Gérard Depardieu', 'Marisa Mell', 'Russ Meyer', 'Bruce Willis', 'Dennis Hopper', 'Morgan Freeman', 'Christopher Walken', 'Michael Caine', 'Christopher Lee', 'Danny DeVito', 'Johnny Depp', 'Sylvester Stallone', 'Romy Schneider', 'Steve Buscemi', 'Nicolas Cage', 'Robin Williams', 'Willem Dafoe', 'Donald Sutherland', 'Alec Baldwin', 'Dan Aykroyd', 'Eddie Murphy', 'Sean Connery', 'John Hurt'] AND d.name in ['Woody Allen', 'Alfred Hitchcock', 'Steven Spielberg', 'Russ Meyer', 'Jan Svankmajer', 'Martin Scorsese', 'Clint Eastwood', 'Harald Reinl', 'François Truffaut', 'Claude Chabrol', 'Ron Howard', 'John Huston', 'Brian De Palma', 'Steven Soderbergh', 'Ingo J. Biermann', 'Ridley Scott', 'John Carpenter', 'Roman Polanski', 'Francis Ford Coppola', 'Michael Curtiz', 'Joel Coen', 'Joel Schumacher', 'Wes Craven', 'Pedro Almodóvar', 'Zalman King', 'Barry Levinson', 'Billy Wilder', 'Tony Scott', 'Akira Kurosawa'] AND not d.name = a.name return p limit 5000;
